name: The Adventurous Four
description: "The Adventurous Four" is a sequel to our "Wild Island Quest" visual novel, which was published a few years ago. In this game-book you'll have to go on a journey full of dangers and adventures. The main characters are all good friends, ready to overcome difficulties to save each other in this quest.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000 Processor: CPU 1 Ghz or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics Storage: 1238 MB available space Sound Card: Any sound card
